metadata.title: CVE-2024-2312 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: GRUB2 does not call the module fini functions on exit, leading toDebian/Ubuntu's peimage GRUB2 module leaving UEFI system table hooksafter exit. This lead to a use-after-free condition, and could possiblylead to secure boot bypass.

criterions.comment: grub2-unsigned package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
grub2-signed package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
